attributes.action: Force newspapers to list religion of all sexual groomers not only Muslim soundin
attributes.background: Whenever there is news story of sexual grooming in the news they are very quick to bring it to everyone's attention if it involves a Muslim sounding name. Do sexual groomers only come in Muslim? I think not. Please force the newspapers to list all religions or stop them from listing any.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The media are independent of both the UK Government and Parliament. If you wish to make a specific complaint about a report or article you can complain to the Independent Press Standards Organisation using the following website: https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/index.html
